field.name: fWeaponSwayHSizeMultiplier
field.desc: The multiplier to control horizontal size of the sway by weapon

field.name: fWeaponSwayVSizeMultiplier
field.desc: The multiplier to control vertical size of the sway by weapon

field.name: fWeaponSwayHSpeedMultiplier
field.desc: The multiplier to control horizontal speed of the sway by weapon

field.name: fWeaponSwayVSpeedMultiplier
field.desc: The multiplier to control vertical speed of the sway by weapon

field.name: fMaxPawnMoveSpeedForMaxSway
field.desc: For moving sways the values will be scaled by the player's speed as a proportion of this value.

field.name: fMaxAngularSpeedForSwayReduction
field.desc: If UseAngularSpeedReduction is set then sway will be at 0 as the camera rotation speed gets closer to this value.

field.name: fSwayHorizIKSizeMultiplier
field.desc: When camera bone is used for sway the sway angle yaw is multiplied by this.

field.name: fSwayVertIKSizeMultiplier
field.desc: When camera bone is used for sway the sway angle pitch is multiplied by this.
